title: Staff rules:
description: Those who do not follow will be demoted!

fields.name: 1. DO NOT ABUSE YOUR POWER.
fields.value: Great power comes with great responsibility.

fields.name: 2. Take action ASAP when someone violates the rules, contact the owner (which is me) when things go out of hand.
fields.value: We wouldn't want a chaotic server right?

fields.name: 3. Be mature and respectful.
fields.value: You're one of the staff, at least be a role model to the users here.
